item.description:
Last night was fun - though the weather wasn't too nice. As a result, the bar area was crowded and a bit loud, so we migrated to O'Briens for drinks outside and later played some pool and sang some karaoke.
Yeah, let's do it again!
We'll meet on the Deck at 7:00, and from there we can listen to the music, watch the sunset, and/or move on from there!
Either way, it's a good way to get some ya-ya's out before it's back to work on Monday!

Feel free to call me at 631-433-5223 with questions or comments/suggestions! Keep this number handy 'cause if you're late we may have moved on, and we wouldn't want to leave you behind!

Our pledge: Mark and Mia will NEVER cancel an event (I have and will again drink alone!) - so if you decide to join us at the last minute - we will be there - count on it!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the bar - or call Mark at 631-433-5223
item.name: Sunday Sunsets
